mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods (goodsCode, goodsName, firstClassification, secondClassification, brand, goodsPrice, goodsStock, goodsDescription, goodsImage, goodsThumbnailImage) values (#{goodsCode}, #{goodsName}, #{firstClassification}, #{secondClassification}, #{brand}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsStock}, #{goodsDescription}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsThumbnailImage})
mapper.select: SELECT goodsCode, goodsName, firstClassification, secondClassification, brand, goodsPrice, goodsStock, goodsDescription, goodsImage, goodsAddedTime FROM goods ORDER by goodsCode DESC
SELECT goodsCode, goodsName, firstClassification, secondClassification, brand, goodsPrice, goodsStock, goodsDescription, goodsImage, goodsAddedTime FROM goods WHERE goodsCode = #{goodsCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET goodsName = #{goodsName}, firstClassification = #{firstClassification}, secondClassification = #{secondClassification}, brand = #{brand}, goodsPrice = #{goodsPrice}, goodsStock = #{goodsStock}, goodsDescription = #{goodsDescription} WHERE goodsCode = #{goodsCode}
